title: Resilience: An Interview with George Takei Pt. 1
itunes:title: Resilience: An Interview with George Takei Pt. 1
itunes:subtitle: On today's episode of Here's Where It Gets Interesting, Sharon speaks with actor George Takei.
description:
On today's episode of Here's Where It Gets Interesting, Sharon speaks with actor George Takei about his childhood experiences with forced removal and incarcerated camp life.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
